column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for taking the time to write a review
column2: Traci.  I am very sorry to hear about your disappointing visit.  If you're up to it
column3: our Manager would like to speak with you about this.  I will send you a private message so we can contact you directly.  Thank you again for taking the time to write - we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.
